# Lecture 5: Layouts (cont'd)
---

Welcome to Lecture 5! Here's a brief breakdown of today's class.

#### Learning Objectives
---

1. Understand how to apply the box model towards creating complex, multi-columned grids
2. Understand how to use the CSS flexbox set of properties as an alternative to floats.

#### Rundown
---

#### [Warmup](#warmup)
#### [Flexbox](#flexbox)
#### [Lab](#lab)

desc.content: Introduction to using flexbox for building CSS layouts
